subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Mark Recchi, Michael Ryder and David Krejci scored third-period goals to help the Boston Bruins maintain eighth place in the Eastern Conference with a 5-2 victory over the host Carolina Hurricanes on Tuesday night.
snippet: Mark Recchi, Michael Ryder and David Krejci scored third-period goals to help the Boston Bruins maintain eighth place in the Eastern Conference with a 5-2 victory over the host Carolina Hurricanes on Tuesday night.
